description.plain:
Born as Felix De Laet, Lost Frequencies is a deep house producer and DJ from Brussels, Belgium. He gained worldwide recognition in 2014 when he released his version of “Are You With Me,” a track originally sung by American country musician Easton Corbin. His second single “Reality,” featuring Dutch singer-songwriter Janieck Devy, strengthened his success and peaked on European charts in 2015.

In 2016 De Laet released his debut album “Less Is More”. The album spawned three more singles: “Beautiful Life” featuring Swedish singer Sandro Cavazza, “What Is Love 2016” and “All or Nothing” featuring Finnish singer Axel Ehnström. The album reached #3 on the Flemish Album Charts and #10 on the Wallonian Album Charts.

De Laet started his own recording label Found Frequencies in 2017. The first single to be released by his label was “Crazy”, a collaboration with Dutch DJ duo Zonderling. The track became his 5th number 1 single on the Flemish Singles Charts after “Are You With Me”, “Reality”, “Beautiful Life” and “What Is Love 2018”. In Wallonia “Crazy” became his 3rd number 1 hit after “Are You With Me” and “Beautiful Life” topped the charts in 2015 and 2016 respectively.

De Laet produces tracks in a studio situated in the attic of his parents' house. He got his stage name from remixes he made for older songs which he called Lost Frequencies when he started his project.

body.plain:
Born as Felix De Laet, Lost Frequencies is a deep house producer and DJ from Brussels, Belgium. He gained worldwide recognition in 2014 when he released his version of “Are You With Me,” a track originally sung by American country musician Easton Corbin. His second single “Reality,” featuring Dutch singer-songwriter Janieck Devy, strengthened his success and peaked on European charts in 2015.

In 2016 De Laet released his debut album “Less Is More”. The album spawned three more singles: “Beautiful Life” featuring Swedish singer Sandro Cavazza, “What Is Love 2016” and “All or Nothing” featuring Finnish singer Axel Ehnström. The album reached #3 on the Flemish Album Charts and #10 on the Wallonian Album Charts.

De Laet started his own recording label Found Frequencies in 2017. The first single to be released by his label was “Crazy”, a collaboration with Dutch DJ duo Zonderling. The track became his 5th number 1 single on the Flemish Singles Charts after “Are You With Me”, “Reality”, “Beautiful Life” and “What Is Love 2018”. In Wallonia “Crazy” became his 3rd number 1 hit after “Are You With Me” and “Beautiful Life” topped the charts in 2015 and 2016 respectively.

De Laet produces tracks in a studio situated in the attic of his parents' house. He got his stage name from remixes he made for older songs which he called Lost Frequencies when he started his project.

songs.title: Reality

description.plain:
Lost Frequencies follow up his last hit, “Are You With Me?”, with another seriously infectious summer chune.

“Reality”, featuring soulful vocals from Janieck Devy is out now on Armada, and is totally radio ready.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ilw-qmqZ5zY

songs.embed_content: Read “Reality” by Lost Frequencies on Genius

songs.full_title: Send It by Austin Mahone (Ft. Rich Homie Quan)
songs.title: Send It

songs.lyrics:
30 ContributorsReality Lyrics[Chorus]
Decisions as I go to anywhere I flow
Sometimes I believe, at times I'm rational
I can fly high, I can go low
Today I got a million, tomorrow I don't know
Decisions as I go to anywhere I flow
Sometimes I believe, at times I'm rational
I can fly high, I can go low
Today I got a million, tomorrow I don't know

[Verse]
Stop claiming what you own, don't think about the show
We're all playing the same game, waiting on our loan
We're unknown and known, special and a clone
Hate will make you cautious, love will make you glow
[Chorus]
Make me feel the warmth, make me feel the cold
It's written in our stories, it's written on the walls
This is our call, we rise and we fall
Dancing in the moonlight, don't we have it all?

[Instrumental Break]

[Chorus]
Decisions as I go to anywhere I flow
Sometimes I believe, at times I'm rational
I can fly high, I can go low
Today I got a million, tomorrow I don't know
Make me feel the warmth, make me feel the cold
It's written in our stories, it's written on the walls
This is our call, we rise and we fall
Dancing in the moonlight, don't we have it all?You might also like40Embed

Drink some Margaritas by a string of blue lights
Listen to the Mariachi play at midnight
Are you with me, are you with me?

songs.lyrics:
13 ContributorsMelody Lyrics[Verse 1]
Hey melody
Every night you play me something sweet
And when I'm down, you always change the key
I need you now, my heart has lost the beat
And I'm counting on your love, hey melody
We both could use a reason just to smile
So let me be your harmony tonight
Every note you hit cuts into me

[Chorus]
So let me hear your love, sing
So let me hear your love, sing
Let me hear your love, sing
So let me hear your love, sing
So let me hear your love, sing
Let me hear your love, sing
[Verse 2]
Hey melody
Every night you play me something sweet
And when I'm down, you always change the key
I need you now, my heart has lost the beat
And I'm counting on your love, hey melody
We both could use a reason just to smile
So let me be your harmony tonight
Every note you hit cuts into me

[Chorus]
So let me hear your love, sing
